Package renderer

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
renderer.Camera
public class Camera extends Object
class for representing camera view

    • Camera

      public Camera(Point location, Vector vto, Vector vup)
      Builds camera according to location of source point and vectors that define view plane
      Parameters:
      location - point where the camera is located
      vto - z-axis to view plane

    • constructRay

      public Ray constructRay(int nX, int nY, int j, int i)
      Constructs ray through pixel
      Parameters:
      nX - columns
      nY - rows
      j - pixel column
      i - pixel row
      Returns:
      Ray starting at camera that goes through the pixel
